verse: How wonderful it is, how pleasant, when brothers live in harmony!
For harmony is as precious as the fragrant anointing oil that was poured over Aaronâ€™s head and ran down onto his beard and onto the border of his robe.
Harmony is as refreshing as the dew on Mount Hermon, on the mountains of Israel. And God has pronounced this eternal blessing on Jerusalem, even life forevermore.
